articles.author: Natalie Neysa Alund
articles.title: Missing surfer likely dead in Australia shark attack: 'There's just been no sign of him' - USA TODAY
articles.description: A search is underway for a missing surfer in Australia who is presumed dead from a likely shark attack.
articles.content:
Police said emergency crews in Australia continued to scour ocean waters looking for a surfer who disappeared beneath the surface after likely being attacked by a shark.
Just after 7 p.m. local time… [+1665 chars]
